remark.ch:
1.限生科所碩士班植物暨微生物環境生物學組
2.與LS6005B、LS7001B、LS7003B合併上課

goal.ch: This is a subject for master students of Institute of Life Science showing them how to organize and present their research works. Students of the first year are required to present recently published works of their interested fields. For senior students, they are required to review the works in their research fields and present it to the peers in a talk of about 30 min. They are also encouraged to present their own works. Students who fail to prepare their talks properly will be required to repeat their talks later in the semester.
goal.en: This is a subject for master students of Institute of Life Science showing them how to organize and present their research works. Students of the first year are required to present recently published works of their interested fields. For senior students, they are required to review the works in their research fields and present it to the peers in a talk of about 30 min. They are also encouraged to present their own works. Students who fail to prepare their talks properly will be required to repeat their talks later in the semester.

outline.ch:
1. 環境毒物
2. 細胞與遺傳毒理
3. 組織與細胞培養
4. 細胞生物
5.生物技術
6. 基因調控
7. 腸病毒誘導神經細胞死亡的機制
8. 綠茶調節脂肪細胞的功能
9. 荷爾蒙與營養物調節抗胰島素激素的基因表達
10. 細胞分化的基因調控
11.以功能性蛋白體學研究細菌降解有機毒性環境污染物的機制
12. 多種亞型干擾素之純化及蛋白質體學
13. 用功能性遺傳學及基因體定位的方法來株選及研究阿拉伯芥之抗熱基因
14. 鈣離子訊號傳遞與氨基酪酸生合成對植物高溫逆境耐受度之影響
15. 植物逆境生理學與基因調節
outline.en: This is a subject for master students of Institute of Life Science showing them how to organize and present their research works. Students of the first year are required to present recently published works of their interested fields. For senior students, they are required to review the works in their research fields and present it to the peers in a talk of about 30 min. They are also encouraged to present their own works. Students who fail to prepare their talks properly will be required to repeat their talks later in the semester.

textbook.ch: 各種生命科學期刊及光碟資料

gradMethod.ch:
“評分方式：
1. 口頭報告(70％): 
2. 課堂討論與參與度(30％)“
